mental_health.text: You are not alone in this. Even when it feels like the world is against you, there are people who care.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: Healing isn't about erasing your past; it's about making peace with it.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: Your mental health is just as important as your physical health. Take care of both.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: It's okay to not be okay. What matters is that you're trying.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: You have survived 100% of your worst days. You're doing better than you think.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It's about how you drive, not where you're going.
mental_health.author: Noam Shpancer

mental_health.text: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn't.
mental_health.author: John Green

mental_health.text: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
mental_health.author: Dan Millman

mental_health.text: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us, but those who win battles we know nothing about.
mental_health.author: Unknown

mental_health.text: Your current situation is not your final destination. The best is yet to come.
mental_health.author: Unknown

motivation.text: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes.
motivation.author: William James

motivation.text: You don't have to be positive all the time. It's perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared, or anxious. Having feelings doesn't make you a negative person.
motivation.author: Lori Deschene

motivation.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

self_care.text: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
self_care.author: Eleanor Brown

self_care.text: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit.
self_care.author: Ralph Marston

self_care.text: Taking care of yourself doesn't mean me first, it means me too.
self_care.author: L.R. Knost

self_care.text: You can't pour from an empty cup. Take care of yourself first.
self_care.author: Unknown

self_care.text: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it's holy ground.
self_care.author: Unknown

self_care.text: Self-compassion is simply giving the same kindness to ourselves that we would give to others.
self_care.author: Christopher Germer

self_care.text: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation.
self_care.author: Audre Lorde

self_care.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
self_care.author: Buddha

self_care.text: Self-care is how you take your power back.
self_care.author: Lalah Delia

self_care.text: Put yourself at the top of your to-do list every single day and the rest will fall into place.
self_care.author: Unknown

resilience.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
resilience.author: Japanese Proverb

resilience.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
resilience.author: A.A. Milne

resilience.text: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
resilience.author: J.K. Rowling

resilience.text: The oak fought the wind and was broken; the willow bent and was saved.
resilience.author: Unknown

resilience.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
resilience.author: Marcus Aurelius

resilience.text: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
resilience.author: Elizabeth Edwards

resilience.text: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo - far more flexible than you'd ever believe at first glance.
resilience.author: Jodi Picoult

resilience.text: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger, but what almost kills you makes you brave.
resilience.author: Unknown

resilience.text: You are not stuck where you are unless you decide to be.
resilience.author: Wayne Dyer

resilience.text: Every storm runs out of rain.
resilience.author: Maya Angelou
